food.question: I am yellow, long and curved. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟨 I am the color of sunshine
🌳 I grow on trees in warm places
🐒 Monkeys peel and eat me

food.question: I am round, red, and juicy. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am a fruit that is often red
🥧 You can make a pie with me
⚕️ People say eating one a day is healthy

food.question: I am white, cold, and sweet. I'm often served in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am a dessert
🥶 I melt when it's hot
🥄 People like to eat me with a spoon or a cone

food.question: I am small and green. I grow in a pod and you can eat me as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a vegetable
🍵 I am often served with dinner
🍲 I'm round, green, and grow in a pod

food.question: I am a grain, often served with butter and salt. People eat me from the cob/off the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I am yellow and grow on a stalk
🍿 You can make popcorn from me
👨‍🌾 Farmers grow lots of me

food.question: I am made from milk and can be hard or soft. Mice are said to love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I come from animals like cows or goats
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich
🧀 I am often yellow or white and come in many flavors

food.question: I am round and orange. I am a type of citrus fruit and I'm full of Vitamin C. What am I?

hints.text: 🍊 I am a fruit that starts with the letter O
🥤 You can squeeze me to make juice
⛹️ People eat me to stay healthy

food.question: I'm a drink that comes from cows. I make your bones strong and I'm often poured on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am a white liquid
🥛 Baby cows drink me from their mothers.
💪 I help you grow big and strong.

food.question: I am made of flour, water, and yeast, and baked in an oven. I can be sliced and used for sandwiches or toast. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am often brown or white
🔥 I get hard when I'm stale.
🥪 You can make a sandwich or toast with me.

food.question: I am a dish made with ground meat, tomatoes, and pasta. I'm often served with Parmesan cheese. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I'm a popular dinner dish
🇮🇹 I am often served in Italian restaurants
🥩 I consist of noodles, sauce, and meat.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen during winter.
☃️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when you play with me.

weather.question: I'm hot and yellow and shine in the sky. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
🕶️ You might need sunglasses when I am out.
🌻 Plants love my warmth.

weather.question: I come after the rain and am colorful. You can see me in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
💧 I need both sun and rain to appear.
✨ Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I'm made of water, but I float in the sky. Sometimes I'm white, sometimes I'm gray. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like fluffy sheep.
🌧️ I can bring rain.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I can be gentle or strong, and I make the leaves dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow leaves off trees.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
💨 You can't see me, but you can feel me.

weather.question: I fall from the sky as liquid water. I help the plants and animals to survive. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💦 I am water falling from the sky.
🌱 Plants drink me.

weather.question: I am a big storm with strong winds and heavy rain. I spin around and around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have a swirling center.
🌊 I can cause a lot of damage near the ocean.
💨 I have very strong winds.

weather.question: I am a very cold storm with lots of snow and strong winds. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 Wear a warm coat if you are outside during me
🌬️ The wind makes it hard to see
🌨️ School might be cancelled if I am bad

weather.question: I'm a sudden flash of light in the sky during a storm, followed by a loud noise. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I often come with thunder.
🌩️ You shouldn't stand under a tree when I am around.
💡 I am bright and quick.

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops falling from the sky. I can be small or big and sometimes hurt when I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a type of precipitation.
🤕 I can cause bumps if I fall on your head.
⚽ I can sometimes be the size of a marble!
